```go
func main 
   ch := make(chan int, 3) // buffered channel  
} 

```

```go
func main() { 
   ch := make(chan int, 4) 
   ch <- 2 
   ch <- 4 
   ch <- 6 
   ch <- 8 

   fmt.Println(<-ch) 
   fmt.Println(<-ch) 
   fmt.Println(<-ch) 
   fmt.Println(<-ch) 

} 

```

```go
func main() { 
   ch := make(chan int, 4) 
   ch <- 2 
   ch <- 4 
   ch <- 6 
   ch <- 8 
   ch <- 10  
   fmt.Println(<-ch) 
   ... 
}
```
